metadata.name: UAC Bypass Abusing Winsat Path Parsing - File
metadata.comment: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a path parsing issue in winsat.exe (UACMe 52)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND startswith(lower(file.path), lower('c:\\users\\')) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\system32\\winsat.exe')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\system32\\winmm.dll'))))

output.summary: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using a path parsing issue in winsat.exe (UACMe 52)
